analysis.description:
MITx_TokenSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0x4a527d8fc13c5203ab24ba0944f4cb14658d1db6.sol#471-490) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- multiSig.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/2/0x4a527d8fc13c5203ab24ba0944f4cb14658d1db6.sol#486-487)

MITx_TokenSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0x4a527d8fc13c5203ab24ba0944f4cb14658d1db6.sol#471-490) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- token.balanceOf(beneficiary) == 0

MITx_TokenSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0x4a527d8fc13c5203ab24ba0944f4cb14658d1db6.sol#471-490) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- token.balanceOf(beneficiary) == 0
MITx_TokenSale.placeTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0x4a527d8fc13c5203ab24ba0944f4cb14658d1db6.sol#452-470) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- token.balanceOf(beneficiary) == 0

Reentrancy in MITx_TokenSale.placeTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0x4a527d8fc13c5203ab24ba0944f4cb14658d1db6.sol#452-470):
	External calls:
	- token.balanceOf(beneficiary) == 0 (/unique_chucks/2/0x4a527d8fc13c5203ab24ba0944f4cb14658d1db6.sol#462-465)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokenRaised (/unique_chucks/2/0x4a527d8fc13c5203ab24ba0944f4cb14658d1db6.sol#465-466)

MITx_Token.emergencyERC20Drain (/unique_chucks/2/0x4a527d8fc13c5203ab24ba0944f4cb14658d1db6.sol#273-277) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-oddToken.transfer(owner,amount) (/unique_chucks/2/0x4a527d8fc13c5203ab24ba0944f4cb14658d1db6.sol#276-277)

MITx_TokenSale.placeTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0x4a527d8fc13c5203ab24ba0944f4cb14658d1db6.sol#452-470) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,_tokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x4a527d8fc13c5203ab24ba0944f4cb14658d1db6.sol#468-469)

MITx_TokenSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0x4a527d8fc13c5203ab24ba0944f4cb14658d1db6.sol#471-490) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x4a527d8fc13c5203ab24ba0944f4cb14658d1db6.sol#482-483)

MITx_TokenSale.finishSale (/unique_chucks/2/0x4a527d8fc13c5203ab24ba0944f4cb14658d1db6.sol#493-498) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(multiSig,unassigned) (/unique_chucks/2/0x4a527d8fc13c5203ab24ba0944f4cb14658d1db6.sol)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/2/0x4a527d8fc13c5203ab24ba0944f4cb14658d1db6.sol)

MITx_TokenSale.emergencyERC20Drain (/unique_chucks/2/0x4a527d8fc13c5203ab24ba0944f4cb14658d1db6.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-oddToken.transfer(owner,amount) (/unique_chucks/2/0x4a527d8fc13c5203ab24ba0944f4cb14658d1db6.sol)

Reentrancy in MITx_TokenSale.MITx_TokenSale (/unique_chucks/2/0x4a527d8fc13c5203ab24ba0944f4cb14658d1db6.sol#328-351):
